profileAlternative.name: Dave Auchter
profileAlternative.headline: Vice President at The Haskell Company
profileAlternative.summary:
Haskell delivers $1B+ annually in Architecture, Engineering, Construction (AEC) and Consulting solutions to assure certainty of outcome for complex capital projects worldwide. Haskell is a global, fully integrated, single source design-build and EPC firm with 1,500+/- highly specialized, in-house design, construction and administrative professionals across industrial and commercial market sectors. With 20+ office locations around the globe, Haskell (as well as our family of specialized brands Benham, FreemanWhite, Catalyst, Seiberling and H.R. Gray) is a trusted partner for global and emerging clients such as ABInBev, Pepsico, FritoLay, Gallo and many other distinguished brands.

Specialties:
CPG (Consumer & Packaged Goods)
- Food & Beverage
- Beer, Wine & Spirits
- Consumer Products
- Bio/Pharma
FHE (Federal, Healthcare & Energy)
I&T (Infrastructure & Transportation)
- Municipal
- Education
- Technology
- Aviation/Aerospace
- Water/Wastewater
- Maritime
Facilities
Manufacturing & Distribution
Process, Packaging & Material Handling
Commercial, Office & Interiors

My career has spanned football (NFL), golf (PGA Tour), healthcare, commercial real estate and architecture/engineering/construction. The common thread in these otherwise unique industries is an entrepreneurial passion for responsible business growth, innovative business infrastructure and conscious capitalism.

I've been privileged to serve in many public leadership capacities over the past 20 years. My trustee service includes: Jacksonville Symphony Orchestra; Jacksonville Public Library; Downtown Development Authority (Chair); Jacksonville Economic Development Commission; Downtown Design Review Committee (Chair); the National Association of Industrial and Office Properties of Northeast Florida/NAIOP (past-President); The First Tee; Jacksonville Sports Council (JAXSPORTS); The Players Championship (Committee Chair).

positions.title: Vice President
positions.description: Vice President and Officer at Haskell overseeing enterprise-wide Corporate Marketing as well as Business Development for the company’s largest practice, the Consumer & Packaged Goods (CPG) industrial delivery group. Haskell delivers Architecture, Engineering, Construction (AEC) and Consulting solutions to assure certainty of outcome for complex capital projects worldwide.

positions.title: EVP/COO
positions.description:
Executive Vice President/COO of NAI Hallmark Partners providing leadership across the business to deliver the most thoughtful approach to commercial real estate Brokerage, Asset Management and Development in Northeast Florida. Served as Director of the NAI Global regional affiliation. NAI Hallmark Partners benefits from the largest network of independent commercial real estate firms worldwide, comprised of over 5,000 professionals in 55 countries with more than 350 offices. Working cooperatively and globally, NAI offices complete over $45 billion in combined transactions annually and manage 300+ million square feet of commercial space.
…
see more

positions.title: Vice President
positions.description: One of the largest privately held healthcare staffing firms in the US. Member of company Leadership Team. Responsible for corporate branding and marketing operations with emphasis in business growth through New Media/Web 2.0 technologies and B2C support. Applied expertise in branding, web development, SaaS, content management, SEO, paid search, social media, and web syndication.

positions.title: Vice President-Business Development
positions.description: Corporate communications and sales management responsibility for all divisions of one of the oldest and largest commercial/industrial construction companies in Florida. Tenure highlighted by 400% revenue growth over a seven year period. Duties included brand management, sales, marketing, biz dev technologies, public and government relations.

positions.title: Director of Communications
positions.description: Supported comprehensive communications program for the $2 billion World Golf Village development, which included the relocation and grand opening of the World Golf Hall of Fame (from Pinehurst, NC to St. Augustine, FL). Participated on Executive Committee of WGV Partners including Developers, Hotel Operators, Golf Course Management and PGA Tour Executive Staff.

positions.title: Manager of Media Relations
positions.description:
Served the NFL franchise as primary contact for comprehensive media needs. Coordinated all media interaction, advanced all games and served as team spokesperson. Recognized among top Public Relations Departments in the NFL. Supported Media for Super Bowls XXVIII and XXIX, as well as 65-plus regular season/post season games. Marketing Assistant for Touchdown Jacksonville/NFL Expansion, summers, 1989-1993.
…
see more

positions.title: Marketing Assistant
positions.description: Supported all facets of limited partnership in the successful lobby of National Football League owners and city/state governments in support of NFL expansion in Jacksonville. Team awarded December 1993.

educations.title: Columbia University - Columbia Business School (Exec education)
educations.fieldofstudy: Digital Strategies for Business-Leading the Next Generation Enterprise

given.text:
Dave is one of the best thought leaders I’ve worked with in the recruitment/staffing industry. His tremendous domain expertise and technology savvy enabled him to use the Jobs2Web technology in a unique way to create a competitive advantage for PPR Healthcare. He also showed remarkable creative dexterity in dealing with a very unique set of business circumstances. What made this engagement especially satisfying was that Dave exhibited strong leadership, business acuity and uncompromising integrity, which are traits rarely shared by one individual.
…
See more

I have had the pleasure of working with Dave for over three and a half years. Over this time his clear strategic guidance and approach to innovation have enabled us to build and develop highly complex and successful advertising campaigns across a number of new and existing brands. Our work covers the whole range of online marketing; across Web 2.0 platforms and new media, with a focus on biddable media and new advertising platforms. Our work is set up, delivered and analysed in a highly data driven way and Dave has the perfect balance of attention to detail while still considering the wider strategy. I am expecting only continued success and innovation in our work together.
…
See more

I currently have the privilege & pleasure of working with Dave. Dave is a unique individual containing both creative and analytical skiils, a great combination for someone to excel in a marketing role. His abilities are obviously having a great impact within his current role, and are helping to advance his career. Dave is forward thinking, and understands the meaning of solid partnerships. I am confident he will continue to contribute to his organization, and will go far based on his ability to make things happen and achieve successful results.
…
See more

Dave is a marketing pro in every sense of the term; he consistently looks for fresh, innovative marketing approaches to increase PPR’s recruitment goals. Dave’s excellent communication skills, combined with his experience and knowledge of the recruitment industry make him a true asset to his organization. I highly recommend Dave without equivocation.
…
See more

Dave has been a client of mine for almost a year now. He is extremely personable, intelligent and always open to new opinions and ideas. Whether we're discussing how to improve conversion rates for his campaigns or just catching up on recent changes or events, he is always a joy to work with. I'd recommend Dave to anyone looking for a savvy SEM candidate with great attention to detail and an in-depth understanding of measuring the success of a campaign.
…
See more

As an expert marketer should, Dave not only has a keen eye for detail, but makes sure that his decisions directly and positively impact the bottom line. I would highly recommend Dave and his work to anyone who needs to rely on cutting edge marketing that truly performs.

received.text: Jamie is equally a tremendous asset to Haskell and Haskell clients. He deeply understands and appreciates our service offerings and capabilities; the highly educated and experienced experts who are the core of our success; and the Haskell culture that doesn't simply encourage, but rather, demands integrity, excellence and trust.

Todd is one of the most intelligent and capable individuals I have ever had the pleasure of working with both in a professional setting and volunteer/non-profit initiatives. Todd's technical aptitude and data management proficiency are perhaps rivaled only by his honest and transparent interpersonal skills.

items: The First Tee of North Florida
National Association of Industrial and Office Properties (NAIOP) Northeast Florida
Licensed State of Florida Real Estate Sales Associate
